cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.backend

Class MultipartHolder<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.backend.MultipartHolder<E>

  • public class MultipartHolder<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class providing ability to send multiple files with arbitrary payload over the Restlet HTTP interface. Uses Multipart Content-Type HTTP Header

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz
